name: Sarah Udoma
content: I use this app every day and it's a great way to keep up to date with what's going on in football.

name: Noah Jackson
content: I use this app every day and it's a great way to keep up to date with what's going on in football. It's a shame it won't rotate into landscape mode like its main competitor

name: Darren Wilson
content: Good for scores and commentary but the team lineups have stopped working.

name: Michael Akinuli
content: Good for watching the goals and great for highlights instead of waiting till 10:30 before you can watch highlights on March of the day also no need of sky go

name: Sarah Udoma
content: This app has videos for other premier league teams who play and it also gives me nofications when my favourite team plays
